update sxzz_syn set business_id = #{businessId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, business_name = #{businessName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, business_type = #{businessType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, syn_type = #{synType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, syn_state = #{synState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, syn_result = #{synResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, syn_nums = #{synNums,jdbcType=INTEGER}, syn_response = #{synResponse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, syn_desc = #{synDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, syn_date = #{synDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM sxzz_syn s WHERE s.syn_state = '0' OR (s.syn_state = '1' AND s.syn_result = '1' AND s.syn_nums < 3) ORDER BY s.create_date ASC LIMIT #{delNums}
